segments.text: Our offer is RIB 300 per tape-recorder , F . O . B . Tianjin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We think the price is too high .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the best price we can offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll have to discuss it with my boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can give you a discount if you order for immediate shipment .
segments.speaker: S1
